snippet.title: Lords & Knights - Official Trailer (Android)
snippet.description:
Play Lords & Knights now and become ruler of a mighty empire! 

Join other lords in exciting battles against thousands of players -- all to take control of the country. Build carefully crafted castles across a great and glorious empire!

Features:

• Start by building out your first castle
• Build a number of different buildings within your magnificent castle
• Recruit a powerful army to fight against other lords
• Capture other castles and enlarge your empire
• Stockpile and trade important resources to strengthen your empire
• Develop strategies for capturing and defending castles
• Ally yourself with other players
• Explore new technologies and complete exciting missions
• Experience the beautifully crafted and richly detailed medieval graphic style
• Top-class fun -- alone or with the community

Download the app now for free and join the exciting world of Lords & Knights. Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xyrality.lkclient&hl=en&gl=US
